      • match

        protected boolean match(PageElement pe)
        Does the page element match the criteria. This method returns true if the type of page element matches the element type specified in the constructor. You can define additional matching behaviour by overriding this method.
        Parameters:
        pe - the page element.
        Returns:
        true if the page element matches.
